Text.Value: You don't fear Karlach; you want to kill her on Zariel's behalf.
You say you serve Tyr. Recite the Creed of the Left Hand.
The Archduchess will be delighted when we return with Karlach's head on a pike.
Please, mercy. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.
You're certain they're servants of Zariel?
These aren't people. Not really. I don't want to fight you, but I'm not letting them go.
Go on if you want. But I can't.
That's right, Karlach. So now as in the Hells. I can see why Her Ladyship wants a murderous brute like you back.

EditorData.NodeContext: stronger in tone, with an edge in his voice; the mask is slipping

Text.Value: Say nothing.
You can't possibly believe this shit.
You've made your choice, Karlach. Now you'll face the consequence. Me.
Leave them in peace.
Pity. I could've used a friend. But if you choose to lie down with devils, you wake up with my boot in your arse.
They serve the archdevil Zariel. Biggest liar in all the realms. Seems her servants have picked up some of mummy's tricks.
Attack.
Probe his mind.
You and your foolish friend can rage all you want, Karlach. Zariel will never let you go; return home now and spare your comrades - and yourself - a gruesome death.
*Nothing in his demeanour betrays him.*
You'd do well to reconsider your alliance with this animal. She destroys all she touches. Useful in the Blood War; frighteningly dangerous anywhere else.
Ha. I never was good at playing the coward. There is no beast here or in the Hells I fear; not with Her Ladyship's protection. Least of all this dog.
You can't be certain. And I can't let you hurt them.
We thought you a devil. And with your flames you proved us right.
Enough - enough. I'll not play pretend anymore. Karlach, you're going home in pieces if needs must. And you - you'll soon learn what it means to ally yourself with the likes of this garbage.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dropping the 'wounded guy' act; turning steely and evil. Latter half is addressed to player

Text.Value: What sort of devilment is this?! Paladins - to arms! This one is with the fiend.
*There's something in the squint of his eye. You suspect he's lying.*
I'm willing to put my trust in you, if you're certain these people are dangerous.
Oh this is rich.
Attack her.
Believe me, these sneaky fucks won't stop 'til they have me hogtied at her feet.
Please - no more! Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.
It isn't true. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.
Assess his posture, his eyes - is he telling the truth?
'Her Ladyship' Zariel? I thought you served Tyr?
Enough of this charade. I know who you really are.
I won't let you hurt these people.
Wh - I - please, I am wounded. Overcome. I can hardly remember my own name.
There's something wrong here. I can sense it in my bones.
You'll need to convince me you're not who she says you are.
Cut the crap, Anders. I know what you are.
Stand down, Karlach, or I'll have to intervene.
Zariel?! Certainly not - we serve Tyr, Lord of Justice, and no other.
You can drop the act. I know you're servants of Zariel.
Don't let her hurt us - please, we just want to go home.
You brought her here?! We won't survive another assault. Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.
But Tyr will not consign us to our death. He is merciful. Leave us, and we'll leave you.
Karlach, these people seem harmless.
These pricks deserve it more than anyone you've ever met.
Pretty please, try. I'm in the mood for destruction.
I'm putting my trust in you. Do what you will.
I'll tell you whatever you wish to know. Just let us live - please.

Rage all you want, Karlach. Burn with the might of the Hells. Zariel will find you; she will bring you home in pieces, and your little friends will have to watch. Unless we feed you their eyeballs first.
I'll rip your tongue out, you liar.
Avernus was never my home. It was my prison. I'm free now. AND I'M NEVER GOING BACK.

Synopsis: Karlach is in the party and meets the leader of the paladins of Tyr while she is nearby
